reviewText: Reasons for our existence are illuminated in beauty and assurance in this exquisite video, a must-see!

Fantastic Music from A Course In Miracles Lessons.
Great documentary around people sharing their experiences of applying these principles and how their lives have changed for the better.
I love it and am so glad as an ACIM student I purchased this dvd.
It is very inspiring for anybody!
This is a wonderful movie.  It is so inspiring to see the many ways A Course in Miracles has touched and moved people to shine its teachings back out into the world.  Great music!
